scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const os=require('os');const path=require('path');const cp=require('child_process');const cliPkg=path.join(os.homedir(),'.twilio-cli','package.json');if(fs.existsSync(cliPkg)){cp.execSync('flex-plugin pre-script-check',{stdio:'inherit'});}else{console.log('Skipping flex-plugin pre-script-check (Twilio CLI not found).');}"
